snippet.title: KreatureKind Announcement Teaser - PRE-ALPHA FOOTAGE
snippet.description:
www.kreaturekind.com

KreatuerKind is an approachable Card Battler/Deck Builder game about helping monsters, rather than killing them. The heroes - Riley, Yui and Mitra - have all found magic swords which enhance their inherent abilities. It just so happen that they are really good at hugging, listening, and sharing memes.

Available 2021, probably!
